background: A company is deciding where to promote their product with options including z-tube, soorchle engine, and wassa advertisements.
constraints: Number of z-tube ads is an integer
Number of soorchle ads is an integer
Number of wassa ads is an integer
Number of z-tube ads is non-negative
Number of soorchle ads is non-negative
Number of wassa ads is non-negative
Total spending on z-tube ads does not exceed Budget
Total spending on soorchle ads does not exceed Budget
Total spending on wassa ads does not exceed Budget
The sum of spending on z-tube, soorchle, and wassa ads does not exceed Budget
Number of soorchle ads is at most MaxAdsSoorchle
Number of wassa ads is at most MaxPropWassa times the total number of ads
Number of z-tube ads is at least MinPropZtube times the total number of ads
objective: Maximize the total number of viewers from ads across all platforms
description: A company is deciding where to promote their product. Some options include z-tube, soorchle engine, and wassa advertisements. The cost for each option and the number of viewers they each attract is given. On z-tube, each ad costs \$\var{CostZtube} and attracts \var{ViewersZtube} viewers. On soorchle, each ad costs \$\var{CostSoorchle} and attracts \var{ViewersSoorchle} viewers. On wassa, each ad costs \$\var{CostWassa} and attracts \var{ViewersWassa} viewers. Soorchle limits the number of advertisements from a single company to \var{MaxAdsSoorchle}. Moreover, in order to balance the advertising among the three types of media, at most \var{MaxPropWassa} of the total number of advertisements should occur on wassa. And at least \var{MinPropZtube} should occur on z-tube. The weekly advertising budget is \$\var{Budget}. How many advertisements should be run in each of the three types of media to maximize the total audience?

parameters.definition: Cost of an advertisement on z-tube
Number of viewers attracted by an advertisement on z-tube
Cost of an advertisement on soorchle
Number of viewers attracted by an advertisement on soorchle
Cost of an advertisement on wassa
Number of viewers attracted by an advertisement on wassa
Maximum number of advertisements allowed on soorchle
Maximum proportion of the total number of advertisements that should occur on wassa
Minimum proportion of the total number of advertisements that should occur on z-tube
